name: Ninja404
description: Ninja404 is an ERC404 protocol on Ethereum blockchain with a 1:1 NFT mint for each token. Ninja404 NFT is a collection of 200 unique, original and hand-drawn by some of best artists exclusively for Ninja404 Project. Ninja404 will be the first project on ERC404 standard which will have a real usecase of ERC404 protocol as a GAME. Ninja404 Game is an open-world RPG style and Ninja NFTs will be users' in-game character enhancement. Each Ninja NFT has different Rarity, Power index, Health index and Magic Index.
